## Parameters used for the analysis

This report was automatically generated with the gcmcompareR shiny app, using models proyected for the year `r params$Year`, and the `r params$rcp` scenario. The bioclimatic variables used for calculating the outcome shown in this report were `r params$Variables`. The geografic area was chosen using the `r ifelse(params$maptype == "map_draw", "rectangle drawing", ifelse(params$maptype == "map_country", "country selection", "coordinates box"))` tool of the app. The coordinates selected were `r params$Coords`
